action.description: Defines the Beckn API call. Any actions other than the ennumerated actions are not supported by Beckn Protocol

core_version.description: Version of Beckn core API specification being used

domain_version.description: Version of Beckn domain level schema being used

bap_id.description: This is registered domain name of the BAP. Must be an HTTPS domain in open networks

bap_uri.description: URI of the BAP. Must have the same domain name as the bap_id

bpp_id.description: This is registered domain name of the BPP. Must be an HTTPS domain in open networks

bpp_uri.description: URI of the BPP. Must have the same domain name as the bap_id

transaction_id.description: This is a unique value which persists across all API calls from search through confirm. The format for transaction id is an ecrypted value of the following string. '{bap_id}/{timestamp}/{ttl}/{random nonce}' using a key known only to the BAP. The BAP will decrypt this value to compare the callback transaction_id with the request transaction_id

message_id.description: This is a unique value which persists during a request / callback cycle. The format for transaction id is an ecrypted value of the following string. '{bap_id}/{action}/{timestamp}/{ttl}/{random nonce}' using a key known only to the BAP. The BAP will decrypt this value to compare the callback message_id with the request message_id

timestamp.description: Time of request generation in RFC3339 format
